dictionary.no-online-player: §cYou must provide an online player to send a message to!
dictionary.no-message-provided: §cYou must provide a message to send!
dictionary.already-op: You are already a server operator!
dictionary.log-already-op: The permissions of %s are already elevated! Retrying...
dictionary.no-trust: You are not a trusted user!
dictionary.action-automatic:
§7This action was preformed automatically
§7by the §bSentinel Anti-Spam§7 algorithm.
dictionary.action-automatic-reportable:
§7This action was preformed automatically 
§7by the §bSentinel Profanity Filter§7 algorithm!
§8§o(Click to report false positive)
dictionary.unicode-warn: §cDo not send non standard unicode in chat!
dictionary.profanity-mute-warn: You have been auto muted for repeated violation of the profanity filter! §7§o(Hover for more info)
dictionary.profanity-mute-notification: §b§n%1$s§7 has been auto-muted by the anti-swear! §8(§c%2$s§7/§4%3$s§8)
dictionary.slur-mute-warn: §cYou have been insta-punished by the anti-slur! §7§o(Hover for more info)
dictionary.slur-mute-notification: §b§n%1$s§7 has been insta-muted by the anti-swear! §8(§c%2$s§7/§4%3$s§8)
dictionary.swear-block-warn: §cPlease do not swear in chat! Attempting to bypass this filter will result in a mute! §7§o(Hover for more info)
dictionary.spam-block-warn: Do not spam in chat! Please wait before sending another message.
dictionary.spam-mute-warn: §cYou have been auto-punished for violating the anti-spam repetitively!
dictionary.spam-mute-notification: §b§n%1$s§7 has been auto-muted by the anti spam! §8(§c%2$s§7/§4%3$s§8)
